lead_paragraph: A woman who won $42.9 million off a penny bet in a slot machine had her dreams dashed when the casino said the jackpot message was an error.
snippet: A woman who won $42.9 million off a penny bet in a slot machine had her dreams dashed when the casino said the jackpot message was an error.

headline.main: Colorado: Instead of $43 Million, How About Waffles?
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Instead of $43 Million, How About Waffles?
